channel.title: DarkQuest Questions :)
channel.description:
1. What are the www files that I am supposed to use for it? If theres no particular one, may you suggest one for me? I done have any lol
2. Important: How do I get rid of the rs2 style pop-up screens for chatting with npcs? I think its a good idea for portals, but not npcs. How would i remove that? And i know I can checkout a earlier version, but then i wouldnt have any of the other updates that I want :P
3. How do I link the site (hopefully someone will give me some www files) to the source?
Thank you

item.title: DarkQuest Questions :)
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

Err well can u upload it? I need them

Read full topic

item.title: DarkQuest Questions :)
item.dc:creator: @Kapitein_Bier Kapitein Bier
item.description:
@Kapitein_Bier wrote:

If you check out an earlier version, look at the changes made to the new ones and re-add them yourself…

I have some default www files to use with dq, but your database needs some adjustments… I might upload it one time… but it’s revision 69 I believe…

Read full topic
